医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
青春期和成年早期的超重、肥胖与女性中风风险增加有关根据今天发表在《中风》杂志上的研究，在对 50 多年健康数据的分析中，14 岁或 31 岁时超重或肥胖的女性更有可能在 55 岁之前患上缺血性（血栓引起的）中风。 -审查了美国中风协会（美国心脏协会的一个部门）的科学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Overweight-obesity-in-adolescent-and-early-adulthood-linked-to-increased-中风-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Overweight-obesity-in-adolescent-and-early-adulthood-linked-to-increased-中风-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=667e1758-ab99-4c90-b54a-2f24822ed19e Thu, 06 Jun 2024 08:12:21 -0400 Overweight, obesity in adolescence and early adulthood linked to increased stroke risk in women
俄亥俄州立大学创建用户友好的存储库以帮助研究阿尔茨海默病一个可搜索的数据库现已准备好帮助研究阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ohio-State-creates-user-friend-repository-to-help-study-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ohio-State-creates-user-friend-repository-to-help-study-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=797a396d-3d9a-4d34-a196-d2dd7561b1db Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:48:00 -0400 Ohio State creates user-friendly repository to help study Alzheimer's disease
新研究揭示了牙齿缺失和假牙患者面临的隐藏挑战谢菲尔德大学的新研究发现了牙齿缺失和假牙患者面临的隐藏挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-research-reveals-hidden-challenges-faced-by-people-with-tooth-loss-and-dentures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-research-reveals-hidden-challenges-faced-by-people-with-tooth-loss-and-dentures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f60e5c14-970d-4c0e-b74c-deed9822dc79 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:44:37 -0400 New research reveals hidden challenges faced by people with tooth loss and dentures
新方法提供了一种更准确的方法，可以在诊断前九年预测痴呆症伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员开发了一种新的痴呆症预测方法，准确率超过 80%，且可在诊断前九年进行预测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-method-provides-a-more-accurate-way-to-predict-dementia-up-to-nine-years-before-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-method-provides-a-more-accurate-way-to-predict-dementia-up-to-nine-years-before-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fc3705f-da95-4311-b4af-05d98067fd32 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:05:00 -0400 New method provides a more accurate way to predict dementia up to nine years before diagnosis
堕胎权投票箱的胜利仍然意味着争夺堕胎权的法庭斗争在俄亥俄州选民去年修改宪法以保护堕胎权之前，该州总检察长（一位反堕胎的共和党人）表示，这样做将推翻至少 10 项限制堕胎的州法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Wins-at-the-ballot-box-for-abortion-rights-still-mean-court-battles-for-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Wins-at-the-ballot-box-for-abortion-rights-still-mean-court-battles-for-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b866c8d8-fc9b-4535-ac25-6f413c2b883d Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:00:21 -0400 Wins at the ballot box for abortion rights still mean court battles for access
飞机噪音暴露与女性肥胖风险增加有关居住在 90 个美国 (US) 机场附近的女护士的飞机噪音与肥胖之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Aircraft-noise-exposure-linked-to-higher-obesity-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Aircraft-noise-exposure-linked-to-higher-obesity-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=647d6719-27e3-457e-b659-ec7580a50393 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 06:56:00 -0400 Aircraft noise exposure linked to higher obesity risk in women
AI 驱动的乳房 X 光检查将工作量减少 33%，提高乳腺癌检出率丹麦和荷兰的一项研究表明，在乳房 X 光检查中实施人工智能可以显着减少放射科医生的工作量并提高乳腺癌检出率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/AI-driven-mammography-cuts-workload-by-3325-boosts-breast-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/AI-driven-mammography-cuts-workload-by-3325-boosts-breast-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=389e6c58-cda2-4bd4-aa52-1f5de283fc38 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 00:32:00 -0400 AI-driven mammography cuts workload by 33%, boosts breast cancer detection
面部温度可以比现有方法更准确地预测心脏病研究人员发现，面部红外热成像技术使用深度学习算法来分析温度模式，比传统的预测概率工具能够更准确地预测冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Facial-Temperature-can-predict-heart-disease-with-higher-accuracy-than-current-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Facial-Temperature-can-predict-heart-disease-with-higher-accuracy-than-current-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7271cdb-f860-4885-9aad-ae2c085bc078 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 00:06:00 -0400 Facial temperature can predict heart disease with higher accuracy than current methods
新研究显示，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病费用将飙升新研究预测，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病和中风的经济负担将增加近四倍，凸显了预防措施的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-cardioangio-disease-costs-set-to-skyrocket-by-2050-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-cardioangio-disease-costs-set-to-skyrocket-by-2050-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a64f87f3-35a1-445b-a861-9a2808208415 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 23:39:00 -0400 U.S. cardiovascular disease costs set to skyrocket by 2050, new study reveals
美国迫在眉睫的心脏病危机：研究预测到 2050 年，心血管疾病和中风的发病率将惊人上升研究人员预测，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病和中风的发病率将显着增加，而且种族和族裔群体之间的差距也会越来越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Americas-looming-heart-crisis-Study-forecasts-alarming-rise-in-cardioangio-disease-and-中风-by-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Americas-looming-heart-crisis-Study-forecasts-alarming-rise-in-cardioangio-disease-and-中风-by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa3a879c-291d-44b9-a5ee-b4afadcacd6d Wed, 05 Jun 2024 23:19:00 -0400 America's looming heart crisis: Study forecasts alarming rise in cardiovascular disease and stroke by 2050
